attributes.action: Change the British national anthem to the original Halo theme
attributes.additional_details: I have so many childhood memories playing halo. This petition is serious
attributes.background: God save the queen is over 200 years old, I think it's time for an update. The hard truth is Halo is a dead game and this is sad. It would be great if Halo got to live on forever through our country, I also heard the queen is a gamer so she will approve. I would like a gamer to reply. Over and out!!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as it’s about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here: 
http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/Symbols/NationalAnthem.aspx
